tool_description: An API showing all the latest Climate change around the world
name: Climate Change live v2
title: Climate Change live v2

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description: Get News about Climate Change from a specific news resource
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-live-v2.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-live-v2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-live-v2.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-live-v2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change news
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about Climate Change from all over the world.
api_list.code:
